message.body: A twisted tail! A thousand eyes! EPA! EPA!
You know I was there today?
Obama and Biden say what's up

I know, that was the inspiration for my simpsons quote. Did you ask the EPA to pass a law stating that every cut down tree must be replaced by three more? And that companies who ruin water supplies must drink that water themselves strait from the source?
IF ONLY IT WERR THAT SIMPLE.
I imagine politicians toasting, "to our economy and our morals and ne'er the twain shall meet"
You'd be surprised. Career EPA folks are some of the crunchiest folks I've seen. Too bad we don't elect them.
I don't doubt it, i just wish that they were allowed to do more. Was it a good trip?
Hey! It was a good trip. Had mulled wine last night. How's Burlington ? That coffee looks great
Burlington is wonderful! There was a concert that evolved into and open mic at the house im staying at and everyone was so good. I'll bring back some beer samples for us
